author: wn.com
title: Akufo Addo Behind Afokos Suspension..."It Is His Innate Desire To Be Vindictive" - Twum Boafo
text: “…all that is going on is at the direct behest of Nana Addo because if he doesn’t like it, all he needs to do is to say one phrase; stop it and it stops” says Kojo Twum Boafo of the ruling National Democratic Congress ( NDC ). Kojo Twum Boafo
